TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Stage IV is divided into stages IVA and IVB. In stage IVA, the tumor has spread to the bladder and/or the rectum. In stage IVB, the tumor has spread to distant parts of the body.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage IV endometrial stromal sarcoma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "sarcoma de estroma endometrial en estadio IV"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: sarcoma de estroma endometrial en estadio IV

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El estadio IV se divide en los estadios IVA y IVB. En el estadio IVA, el tumor se diseminó a la vejiga o al recto. En el estadio IVB, el tumor se diseminó a partes lejanas del cuerpo.
